text: Heat {{olive_oil}} in a large skillet or Dutch oven over medium heat.

column5: about 10 minutes. Transfer to a plate.

text: Add {{sweet_potato}} and {{sea_salt}} to the skillet. Cook for 6–8 minutes
Stir in {{kale}} and cook until tender
Return the turkey to the skillet and cook for 3–4 minutes to heat through.
